root.name: Bazooka Cafe
root.description: PlotAfter his father's collapses, Hideyuki Mizuno leaves his office job in order to take care of his father's cafe. With the help of former cafe waitress Coca, former co-worker Mitsuki, Ex-girlfriend Narumi and his old office manager Yayoi it's up to him to keep the cafe up and running in his fathers absence.
